ValidationRule.description: Case cannot be closed if PO Review Completed value is "Blank" for GSS .
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile && ((ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Done') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Cancelled') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Discard') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Closed as Duplicate') || ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Portal Quoted'))
&& ISPICKVAL( Type , 'Place Order') && (PO_Review_Completed__c = false) && ($RecordType.Name = 'GSS Quotes Orders') && ( ($Profile.Name !='Portal API User - RFQ' || $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - Self-Registration' || $Profile.Name !='Portal Interfaces App User' || $Profile.Name !='Portal User - Self-Registration' || $Profile.Name !='Portal Hon Adminstrator' || $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - MCORE' || $Profile.Name !='Portal API User RO Automation' || $Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Case cannot be closed if the PO Review Completed value is "not checked" . Please check the PO Review Completed field.
